text: UBS Arena is an arena at Belmont Park in Elmont, New York. It opened on November 19, 2021. It is the home of the New York Islanders of the National Hockey League (NHL) and New York of the Professional Women's Hockey League (PWHL). ==References== ==Other websites== *Official Site Category:New York Islanders Category:Sports buildings in New York (state)
title: UBS Arena
